original_title: I Got Up at 8:59 AM Oct. 19 2021
overview: The morning of 19 October 1961, the international press gave a wide-ranging account of the tragic events that had begun on 17 October in Paris, which was under curfew for North Africans. This film, based on the work of the conceptual artist On Kawara, invites the viewer to relive the story.
title: I Got Up at 8:59 AM Oct. 19 2021
